cause.description:
www.operationlifeshield.com Operation LifeShield is an emergency campaign to deliver badly-needed air raid shelters to Israeli communities that are under constant rocket and missile attack.
1. To provide life saving shelter and prevent physical injury to Israeli civilians.
2. o allow Israeli civilians, especially children, to live as normal a routine as possible even during military crisis. We wish to accomplish that by providing shelter in open public areas such as parks, playgrounds, and sports fields, as well as along the p
cause.mission: Operation LifeShield is an emergency campaign
cause.name: Operation LifeSheild
